name: Age of Fear: The Free World
description: Age of Fear: The Free World is an introduction to a seven-year old turn-based strategy series that fuses a tabletop wargame with RPG elements. Choose your faction (Undead Legion, Human Kingdom or Greenskins Horde), build a unique army and embark on exploring the realm!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL capable Storage: 4 GB available space
